subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Piracy at Sea
Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The six boats competing in the Volvo Ocean Race were again transported onboard an armed ship to the haven of Male, the Maldives capital, because of the threat of pirates along the east coast of Africa.
snippet: The six boats competing in the Volvo Ocean Race were again transported onboard an armed ship to the haven of Male, the Maldives capital, because of the threat of pirates along the east coast of Africa.
